se.nicklasgavelin.bluetooth
Interface BluetoothDiscoveryListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Experimental_Main
public interface BluetoothDiscoveryListener

Used with the "Bluetooth" class to listen for updates regarding the device search that may be performed. Will return events if the device search fails or if the device search is completed. If the device search is completed the devices detected will also be returned.

Author:
Nicklas Gavelin, nicklas.gavelin@gmail.com, Lule√• University of Technology

Called when a search results in a discovered device. Each device discovered will result in a call to this method

Parameters:
device - The device discovered

Parameters:
